description.en:
Collection of 4 short stories:

[*] Nemurihime ni Hyakumankai no Kiss
Akari wants her first kiss to be perfect like in fairytales. One day she comes across the school's playboy, Kira Kousuke, in the library. He steals her first kiss because he was dared to. What will happen now?  (From: MAL)

[*] Psychedelic Unicorn
[*] Street Lily

[*] Diamond Dust
Kaya and her friend Yui have been ice skating for 7 years. Now they are practicing for the Junior Skating Tournament. Kaya can't seem to skate a triple axle (third rotation). Kitsuya, an artist, comments on Kaya's ice skating, and the romance between them begins. Will kaya master the triple axle and do well in the skating tournament?  (From: MAL)

Italian:
4) Diamond Damato
Kaya e Yui sono due amiche e  pattinano fin da piccole ... Entrambe parteciperanno ai campionati Juniores e sembra che non ci sia nulla che le renda rivali, nonostante il torneo. Ma un giorno a causa di un disegno realizzato da un ragazzo, Yui si ingelosisce ed è qui che inizia la rivalità tra le due ragazze!
